const response = await client.search({
  index: "bicycles,other_cycles",
  query: {
    bool: {
      must: {
        match: {
          description: "dutch",
        },
      },
      filter: {
        term: {
          cycle_type: "bicycle",
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
